about_the_game:
Swooping Justice.
A humorous, tongue in cheek game, where you play as a young Australian Magpie, swooping and pooping on societies wrong doers.
Inconsiderate parking inspectors, Abusive cops, Corrupt politicians, Cyclists who don't stay in the bike lane, Scooter and Roller blade kids at skate parks, Drop bears stalking tourists...the list goes on!
You must perform tasks, level by level, to prove to the elder Magpies that you are worthy of their tribe of vigilantes.
The shaved apes of this world can't seem to bring justice themselves, so these courageous magpies must!

A beautifully detailed, pixel art world that includes an aerial map of Melbourne and it's surrounds, linking multiples levels and challenges.
Featuring encounters with many comical characters, each providing trials as you journey throughout your world, uncovering as you go, a comical, surprisingly unique story.

WIP. Still in early development. All art is currently place holder.
Wishlist now. Check back for news and subscribe to my youtube devlog channel for regular updates
https://www.youtube.com/c/paypercutts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core Processor @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2500/4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel HD Audio

short_description: A humorous tongue in cheek Action-Adventure game. You're an Australian Magpie, swooping and pooping on societies wrong doers. Inconsiderate parking inspectors, Abusive cops, Corrupt politicians, scooter and roller blade kids at skate parks, drop bears...the list goes on!
